cheat.description: Blue always has 0 shells/missiles/bombs remaining in battle
Blue always has 15 shells/missiles/bombs remaining in battle
Red always has 0 shells/missiles/bombs remaining in battle
Red always has 15 shells/missiles/bombs remaining in battle
Blue always has 0 fame points (although the displayed tally won't reflect this immediately)
Blue always has 5,000 fame points (although the displayed tally won't reflect this immediately)
Blue always has 10,000 fame points (although the displayed tally won't reflect this immediately)
Red always has 0 fame points (although the displayed tally won't reflect this immediately)
Red always has 5,000 fame points (although the displayed tally won't reflect this immediately)
Red always has 10,000 fame points (although the displayed tally won't reflect this immediately)
